name: ack
actor_no_arg: What? You smell something really bad?
others_no_arg: $n turns away at some really bad smell...Maybe they farted.
actor_found_target: You hold your nose at the smell $N made!
others_found: $n pinches $s nose and turns away from $N, disgusted by the smell $E made.
target_found: $n pinches $s nose and turns away from you, disgusted by the smell you made.
others_auto: $n turns away from $mself, seemingly disgusted by what $e did.
